suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Eletrônicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'browser = chrome'.
Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\durval.neto\Documents\github\WebTesting\geckodriver-3.log

InvalidArgumentException: Message: Malformed URL: URL constructor: browser = chrome is not a valid URL. test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu do site da Amazon.com.br e verifica a categoria computadores e informática.
